Trade/Device Name(s): cobas liat SARS-CoV-2, Influenza A/B & RSV nucleic acid test
cobas® liat SARS-CoV-2, Influenza A/B & RSV
Regulation Name(s): Device To Detect And Identify Nucleic Acid Targets In Respiratory Specimens From Microbial Agents That Cause The SARS-Cov-2 Respiratory Infection And Other Microbial Agents When In A Multi-Target Test
Specimen Container(s): Sterile flocked swabs with synthetic tip with other viral transport media (VTM)
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Multiplex real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for cobas liat SARS-CoV-2, Influenza A/B & RSV multiplex rapid RT-PCR assay on cobas® liat System for qualitative detection of SARS-CoV-2, Influenza A/B, and RSV in respiratory swabs
Indications for Use Summary: Automated rapid multiplex RT-PCR assay for simultaneous qualitative detection and differentiation of SARS-CoV-2, influenza A virus, influenza B virus, and RSV nucleic acids in anterior nasal and nasopharyngeal swabs from symptomatic individuals, aiding differential diagnosis of respiratory viral infections
